roleset.name: not having permission
roleset.note: UNAUTHORIZED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. Relation to 'authorize.01'. (from unauthorized.01-j)

example.name: arg2
example.text: David Wu strongly supports China has sovereignty over the Diaoyu Island according to history and reality , saying that the US government made a mistake , was unauthorized and illegally delivered the Diaoyu Island to Japan in the 1970s , and damaged China 's territorial sovereignty .

example.name: arg1
example.text: she states that this specific project is unauthorized

example.name: args 1, 3
example.text: Customer service said they turned off the discount because it was unauthorized for public use.
